statements: SELECT * FROM experimental_data
SELECT sample_id, sequencing_date FROM experimental_data
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE sample_id = 1
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE sequencing_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM experimental_data ORDER BY sequencing_date DESC
SELECT sample_id, sequencing_date FROM experimental_data WHERE sample_id = 1
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE sequencing_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sequencing_date DESC
SELECT sequencing_date, sample_id FROM experimental_data WHERE sample_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY sample_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT sample_id FROM experimental_data WHERE sequencing_date < '2021-01-01'
SELECT sample_id, YEAR(sequencing_date) AS year FROM experimental_data GROUP BY year HAVING year > 2020 ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT * FROM Samples;
SELECT sample_id, sequencing_date FROM Samples ORDER BY sequencing_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, sample_id FROM Experiments WHERE experiment_id = 3;
SELECT sample_id, sequencing_date FROM Samples WHERE sequencing_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Samples JOIN Experiments ON Samples.sample_id = Experiments.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM Samples WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT sample_id, sequencing_date FROM Samples WHERE sequencing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Experiments JOIN Samples ON Experiments.sample_id = Samples.sample_id WHERE Samples.sequencing_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT experiment_id, sample_id FROM Experiments WHERE experiment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY sample_id DESC;

SELECT Samples.sample_id, Experiments.experiment_id FROM Samples INNER JOIN Experiments ON Samples.sample_id = Experiments.sample_id WHERE Samples.sequencing_date < '2022-01-31' ORDER BY Samples.sample_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Samples;
SELECT sample_name, sequencing_date FROM Samples WHERE sample_id = 2;
SELECT experiment_name, experimental_date FROM Experiments ORDER BY experimental_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Results WHERE result_value > 0.5;

SELECT sample_name, result_value FROM Samples JOIN Experiments ON Samples.sample_id = Experiments.sample_id JOIN Results ON Experiments.experiment_id = Results.experiment_id WHERE Samples.sample_name = 'Example';
SELECT * FROM Samples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sequencing_date FROM Samples WHERE sample_id = 3;
SELECT result_value, result_comment FROM Results WHERE result_value > 10;
SELECT * FROM Experiments JOIN Results ON Experiments.experiment_id = Results.experiment_id;

SELECT Samples.sample_name, Experiments.experiment_name, Results.result_value FROM Samples JOIN Experiments ON Samples.sample_id = Experiments.sample_id JOIN Results ON Experiments.experiment_id = Results.experiment_id ORDER BY Results.result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM SampleIDs ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_id FROM SampleIDs WHERE sample_id = 3;
SELECT sequencing_date, sample_id FROM SequencingDates WHERE sequencing_id = 2;
SELECT experiment_id, data_value FROM ExperimentalData WHERE sample_id = 5 ORDER BY data_value ASC;
SELECT result_info FROM Results WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SampleIDs ORDER BY sample_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM SampleIDs WHERE sample_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY sample_name ASC

SELECT SampleIDs.sample_id, SequencingDates.sequencing_date, ExperimentalData.data_value FROM SampleIDs JOIN SequencingDates ON SampleIDs.sample_id = SequencingDates.sample_id JOIN ExperimentalData ON SampleIDs.sample_id = ExperimentalData.sample_id ORDER BY SequencingDates.sequencing_date DESC, ExperimentalData.data_value DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT Results.result_id, Results.result_info FROM Results INNER JOIN ExperimentalData ON Results.experiment_id = ExperimentalData.experiment_id WHERE ExperimentalData.data_value > 0 ORDER BY Results.result_id ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT SampleIDs.sample_name, Results.result_info FROM SampleIDs LEFT JOIN ExperimentalData ON SampleIDs.sample_id = ExperimentalData.sample_id LEFT JOIN Results ON ExperimentalData.experiment_id = Results.experiment_id ORDER BY SampleIDs.sample_name ASC, Results.result_info DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Samples;
SELECT sample_id, location, sequencing_date FROM Samples ORDER BY sequencing_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, COUNT(*) FROM Results GROUP BY experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM Experiments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.name, r.department, e.experiment_type FROM Researchers r JOIN Experiments e ON r.researcher_id = e.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM Samples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, location FROM Samples WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT name, department FROM Researchers WHERE department = 'Biology' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT result_id, result_data FROM Results WHERE result_data LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT experimeint_id, experiment_type FROM Experiments WHERE start_date < '2021-01-01';
